articles.description: Author Geetanjali Shree and translator Daisy Rockwell share the £50,000 prize for ‘extraordinarily funny and fun’ Tomb of Sand
articles.content: Geetanjali Shrees extremely exuberant and incredibly playful Tomb of Sand, translated from Hindi by Daisy Rockwell, has won the International Booker prize, becoming the first novel translated from Hi… [+3996 chars]

articles.title: Cambridge-based BBC Look East news broadcast to end, says corporation - BBC
articles.description: BBC says although it is "proud" of its Cambridge services it has to make "tough choices".
articles.content:
Image caption, The merging of the western-area version of Look East with the Norwich-based broadcast is part of a raft of proposals outlined by the BBC for its local services
